IMPORTANT:
 A compatible Android smart watch with Wear OS 2.0 or greater connected to this phone via bluetooth is required to use this app.

 DISCLAIMER:
 This software is provided free of charge and can be an invaluable tool track match time, yellow cards and penalties.

 Any software has the potential to crash; never rely on this app to keep score and ALWAYS wear a backup watch to save embarrassment!

 If this app is helpful, please leave positive feedback using the button below.

 INSTRUCTIONS:
 * Install this app on your smart watch, connect to this phone using the Wear OS app and click start below.

 * Select period/yellow card lengths and team colours and send to the smart watch before the match.

 * Click match time to start/stop all timers.

 * Long pressing the penalty counters will reverse the count.
